name: Vogue, The Explorer
description: Join the adventures of Lara into a Vogue strange world. You will need to use 3d platforming skills in order to evade. You will encounter some weird creatures that will attack you.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 2 ghz Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Gt3200 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 4000 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: core i5 Memory: 8000 MB RAM Graphics: Ge force 10 1080 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 5000 MB available space Sound Card: 5.1 surround
